Type.Name: InsertAtCursorHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InsertAtCursorHandler(object o, InsertAtCursorArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed InsertAtCursorHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the InsertAtCursorHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the InsertAtCursorHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the InsertAtCursorHandler is removed from the event.
